modern-downtown-condo.title: Modern Downtown Condo Transformation
modern-downtown-condo.challenge: The client wanted to transform their dated condo into a modern, bright living space while minimizing disruption to their busy schedule. The project required precise color matching and working around existing furniture.
modern-downtown-condo.solution: Our team developed a phased approach, completing one room at a time to allow the client to continue living in the space. We used low-VOC premium paints and implemented careful surface preparation to ensure a flawless finish.
results: Zero disruption to client's daily routine
Transformed dark spaces into bright, modern rooms
Client referred 3 additional projects within the same building

testimonial.quote: Ascent Group exceeded all expectations. Their attention to detail and professionalism made the entire process stress-free. The transformation is stunning!
testimonial.author: Sarah M.

heritage-home-stucco.title: Heritage Home EIFS Restoration
heritage-home-stucco.challenge: A 1920s heritage home had deteriorating stucco with water infiltration issues. The owners wanted to preserve the historic character while upgrading to modern, energy-efficient materials.
heritage-home-stucco.solution: We designed a custom EIFS system that replicated the original stucco texture while providing superior insulation and waterproofing. All work was done in compliance with heritage preservation guidelines.
results: Heritage board approval on first submission

testimonial.quote: They perfectly balanced preserving our home's character with modern performance. The craftsmanship is outstanding.
testimonial.author: Robert & Linda K.

commercial-office-tower.title: Bay Street Office Tower Renovation
commercial-office-tower.challenge: Complete interior refresh of occupied office building requiring after-hours work with zero business disruption. Tight deadline before new tenant move-in.
commercial-office-tower.solution: Implemented night shift scheduling (6 PM - 6 AM) with complete floor protection and odor-free low-VOC materials. Coordinated with building management for elevator access and security protocols.
results: Zero business disruption - all work after hours
No tenant complaints about odor or noise

testimonial.quote: Ascent's professionalism and coordination were flawless. Our tenants didn't even know the work was happening.
testimonial.author: David C.

oakville-exterior-repaint.title: Oakville Family Home Exterior
oakville-exterior-repaint.challenge: Severe paint failure from previous DIY attempts, with peeling, cracking, and exposed wood in multiple areas. Client needed weather-resistant solution before winter.
oakville-exterior-repaint.solution: Complete surface preparation including scraping, sanding, and wood repair. Applied premium weather-resistant coating system with proper primers and two finish coats.

testimonial.quote: After our DIY disaster, Ascent Group rescued our home. Their expertise and quality are unmatched.
testimonial.author: Michael J.

harbour-condos.title: Harbourfront Condo Complex - 120 Units
harbour-condos.challenge: Annual maintenance program requiring coordination with 120 unit owners, minimal disruption, and consistent quality across all units during tenant turnovers.
harbour-condos.solution: Implemented systematic scheduling with 3-day unit turnover process. Created standardized color palette and quality checklist. Dedicated team for common areas during off-peak hours.

testimonial.quote: Ascent's organization and consistency made managing this large project effortless. Quality was excellent across all 120 units.
testimonial.author: Patricia R.

luxury-kitchen-cabinets.title: Luxury Kitchen Cabinet Refinish
luxury-kitchen-cabinets.challenge: Client wanted to update their kitchen without the cost and disruption of full cabinet replacement. Required factory-quality finish with custom color.
luxury-kitchen-cabinets.solution: Professional spray finishing in our climate-controlled facility. Custom color matching to client's specification using premium conversion varnish.
results: Kitchen ready to use in 1 week

testimonial.quote: I can't believe these are the same cabinets! The finish is flawless and the color is exactly what I wanted.
testimonial.author: Jennifer L.

square-one-parking-garage.title: Square One Parking Structure
square-one-parking-garage.challenge: Underground parking garage with severe concrete deterioration, active leaks, and faded line striping. Work required during operating hours with maintained access.
square-one-parking-garage.solution: Phased approach working one level at a time. Applied epoxy coating system with waterproofing membrane. Completed all line striping with high-visibility traffic paint.

testimonial.quote: The transformation is remarkable. Our parking structure looks brand new and the waterproofing has solved all our leak issues.
testimonial.author: Tom H.

law-office-buildout.title: Downtown Law Office Suite Buildout
law-office-buildout.challenge: Complete build-out of bare shell space into professional law office with 12 private offices, conference rooms, and reception. Tight deadline before lease commencement.
law-office-buildout.solution: Comprehensive interior construction including framing, drywall, millwork, and finishing. Coordinated with MEP trades and installed custom built-ins for legal library.

testimonial.quote: Ascent delivered a beautiful, functional office space on time and on budget. The quality of workmanship is exceptional.
testimonial.author: Mark S.

medical-clinic-renovation.title: Medical Clinic Interior Renovation
medical-clinic-renovation.challenge: Transform dated medical office into modern facility with 8 exam rooms, procedure room, lab, and accessible washrooms. Required compliance with healthcare regulations.
medical-clinic-renovation.solution: Complete renovation with antimicrobial finishes, specialized medical lighting, and ADA-compliant features. Coordinated with medical equipment installers and maintained partial operations during construction.

testimonial.quote: Ascent understood the unique requirements of a medical facility. The space is functional, beautiful, and fully compliant.
testimonial.author: Dr. Amanda K.

condo-tower-sealants.title: High-Rise Condo Building Envelope
condo-tower-sealants.challenge: 28-story residential tower experiencing water infiltration around windows. Required complete perimeter sealant replacement while building remained occupied.
condo-tower-sealants.solution: Systematic floor-by-floor approach using swing stage access. Removed all failed sealant, prepared joints, and installed premium silicone system with proper backer rod.

testimonial.quote: Professional rope access work with no disruption to residents. The water leak issues are completely resolved.
testimonial.author: George M.

commercial-plaza-masonry.title: Oakville Commercial Plaza Brick Restoration
commercial-plaza-masonry.challenge: 1970s commercial plaza with deteriorating mortar joints, spalling bricks, and water infiltration. Facade needed restoration while stores remained operational.
commercial-plaza-masonry.solution: Complete tuck pointing of all joints, selective brick replacement, professional cleaning, and application of breathable water repellent sealer.
results: Enhanced curb appeal increased foot traffic 25%

testimonial.quote: The plaza looks better than when it was new. Professional work with minimal impact on our retail tenants.
testimonial.author: Susan P.

hotel-lobby-tile.title: Boutique Hotel Lobby Flooring
hotel-lobby-tile.challenge: High-traffic hotel lobby required complete flooring replacement during brief closure window. Custom pattern design needed to match hotel's luxury aesthetic.
hotel-lobby-tile.solution: Precision installation of large-format porcelain with marble accent borders. Custom pattern layout designed and approved before installation. Waterproofing membrane for longevity.
results: Zero lippage on large format tiles

testimonial.quote: The lobby flooring is absolutely stunning. Ascent's attention to detail and precision is world-class.
testimonial.author: Richard T.

office-tower-metal-cladding.title: Modern Office Tower Facade
office-tower-metal-cladding.challenge: New construction requiring complete ACM panel facade installation on 12-story office building. Tight schedule with coordination of multiple trades.
office-tower-metal-cladding.solution: Engineered rainscreen system with aluminum composite panels. Precision fabrication and installation with thermal bridging prevention. Coordinated with window installers and waterproofing team.
results: 45,000 sq ft facade completed on time
Zero punch list items at final inspection

testimonial.quote: Ascent's expertise in metal cladding systems made this complex project seamless. The building looks spectacular.
testimonial.author: James L.

retail-store-buildout.title: Retail Fashion Store Build-Out
retail-store-buildout.challenge: Fast-track retail buildout in premium mall location. Required custom millwork, display fixtures, and brand-aligned finishes with hard deadline for grand opening.
retail-store-buildout.solution: Accelerated schedule with extended hours. Custom fabrication of display fixtures and millwork. Coordinated with mall management for after-hours delivery and noise restrictions.
results: Store opened on schedule to strong sales

testimonial.quote: Ascent made our impossible timeline possible. The store is beautiful and opened exactly when we needed it to.
testimonial.author: Michelle R.

warehouse-floor-coating.title: Distribution Center Floor Coatings
warehouse-floor-coating.challenge: Active distribution center needed high-performance floor coating with minimal operational downtime. Heavy forklift traffic required industrial-grade system.
warehouse-floor-coating.solution: Phased installation working one zone at a time. Applied high-build epoxy system with rapid cure time. Completed all safety striping and aisle markings to OSHA standards.
results: Floor ready for traffic in 24 hours per zone

testimonial.quote: Minimal disruption and maximum quality. The new floor system is holding up perfectly under our heavy forklift traffic.
testimonial.author: Carlos M.
